Types of Discrimination.quote: The Lord looks on the heart, while humans look on outward appearance. (1 Samuel 16:7)

Divine Judgment.quote: With righteousness He shall judge the poor, and decide with equity. (Isaiah 11:4)

Sacred Discernment.quote: Test the spirits to see whether they are from God. (1 John 4:1)

Spiritual Selection.quote: Many are called, but few are chosen. (Matthew 22:14)

Divine Wisdom.quote: The wisdom from above is first pure, then peaceable, gentle, willing to yield. (James 3:17)

Holy Recognition.quote: My sheep hear my voice, and I know them, and they follow me. (John 10:27)

Divine Choice.quote: I have chosen you out of the world. (John 15:19)

Sacred Division.quote: He will separate people one from another as a shepherd separates sheep from goats. (Matthew 25:32)

Divine Testing.quote: The Lord tests the righteous, but his soul hates the wicked. (Psalm 11:5)

Spiritual Differentiation.quote: To distinguish between the holy and the common. (Leviticus 10:10)

Divine Standards.quote: Be holy, for I am holy. (1 Peter 1:16)

Sacred Evaluation.quote: Each one's work will become manifest, for the Day will disclose it. (1 Corinthians 3:13)

Divine Assessment.quote: God will judge the secrets of men. (Romans 2:16)

Holy Distinction.quote: Put a difference between the unclean and the clean. (Leviticus 11:47)

Divine Sorting.quote: The angels will come out and separate the evil from the righteous. (Matthew 13:49)

Sacred Classification.quote: Who may ascend the mountain of the Lord? Those who have clean hands and pure hearts. (Psalm 24:3-4)

Divine Examination.quote: I the Lord search the heart and test the mind. (Jeremiah 17:10)

Holy Separation.quote: Come out from among them and be separate, says the Lord. (2 Corinthians 6:17)

Divine Perception.quote: The Lord knows those who are his. (2 Timothy 2:19)

Sacred Judgment.quote: The judgments of the Lord are true and righteous altogether. (Psalm 19:9)

Divine Distinction.quote: God shows no partiality, but in every nation anyone who fears him is acceptable. (Acts 10:34-35)

Holy Discernment.quote: Solid food is for the mature, who have their powers of discernment trained. (Hebrews 5:14)

Divine Selection.quote: You did not choose me, but I chose you. (John 15:16)

Sacred Refinement.quote: He will sit as a refiner and purifier of silver. (Malachi 3:3)

Holy Classification.quote: The Lord knows how to rescue the godly from trials. (2 Peter 2:9)

Divine Recognition.quote: I never knew you; depart from me. (Matthew 7:23)

Sacred Differentiation.quote: A time to gather stones together, and a time to cast away stones. (Ecclesiastes 3:5)

Divine Filtering.quote: His winnowing fork is in his hand, to clear his threshing floor. (Matthew 3:12)

Holy Analysis.quote: Let a person examine himself, then. (1 Corinthians 11:28)
